El Xampanyet is fun, noisy, chaos, with some good tapas and cheap cava. We really loved the different pimientos del padron and the sun dried tomatoes. The cava is a little sweet to my taste. The pan con tomat is forgettable but we enjoyed the leeks. You will have to get there early, or queue and be prepared to elbow :)More info on my blog mylifeinsin.com/2015/04/…
